attributes.action: encourage the London Olympic Committee to rethink their choice of 2012 Logo
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The London 2012 Olympic and Paralympic Games have unveiled a new logo which in no way reflects the city, or the event it represents.

The logo looks more like the sort of thing thought up by a PR firm for the latest "urban regeneration quango" than a major sporting event.

We ask that the Prime Minister encourages the Committee to reconsider its decision and develop a logo which is visually immediately identifiable with the London Olympics and not a blob of colour which would have even Rolf Harris asking "can you tell what it is yet?"

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
